name: ralimdaa
params: setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wi(w0, wi(wral(s0, c0, w1), wral(s0, c0, w2)))

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wi(wral(s0, c0, w1), wral(s0, c0, w2)), wral(s0, c0, wi(w1, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wral(s0, c0, w1), wral(s0, c0, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wral(s0, c0, wi(w1, w2)))
-| wi(wral(s0, c0, wi(w1, w2)), wi(wral(s0, c0, w1), wral(s0, c0, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wral(s0, c0, w1), wral(s0, c0, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wral(s0, c0, wi(w1, w2)))
-| wi(wral(s0, c0, wi(w1, w2)), wi(wral(s0, c0, w1), wral(s0, c0, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wral(s0, c0, wi(w1, w2)))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(w0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wi(w1, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wral(s0, c0, w1), wral(s0, c0, w2)))
-| wi(wral(s0, c0, wi(w1, w2)), wi(wral(s0, c0, w1), wral(s0, c0, w2)))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(w0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wi(w1, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wi(w1, w2)))
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wi(w1, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wral(s0, c0, w1), wral(s0, c0, w2)))
-| wi(wral(s0, c0, wi(w1, w2)), wi(wral(s0, c0, w1), wral(s0, c0, w2)))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wi(w1, w2))

body.origin: |- wi(wral(s0, c0, wi(w1, w2)), wi(wral(s0, c0, w1), wral(s0, c0, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wral(s0, c0, w1), wral(s0, c0, w2)))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wi(w1, w2))

comment: Deduction quantifying both antecedent and consequent, based on Theorem 19.20 of [Margaris] p. 90. (Contributed by NM, 22-Sep-2003.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 29-Dec-2019.)
